FuncDef: This command allows loopback detection to be enabled and disabled for MLPPP bundles. It is disabled by default. When the magic number option is disabled, the magic number option will not be requested when a member is trying to bring up the LCP layer on a member link; if the remote peer requests this option, it will be rejected. When transmitting echo-requests a magic number of 0 is used. When responding to echo-requests a magic number of 0 is sent.
